0.text: Innate - Aura: Sona's basic abilities each generate a unique aura for 3 seconds that empowers her and all targetable allied  champions who enter its radius, and they place her other basic abilities that are not on cooldown on a 0.5-second cooldown.

1.text: Innate - Power Chord: After casting 3 basic abilities, Sona's next basic attack has an  uncancelable windup, deals 20 − 240 (based on level) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage and applies an additional effect depending on the last basic ability cast.

2.text: Power Chord  resets Sona's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Sona sends out bolts of sound that deal magic damage to the two nearest  visible enemies, prioritizing champions.

1.text: Aura: Sona and tagged allied champions deal bonus magic damage on their next basic attack within 5 seconds.

2.text: Granting an ally (other than herself) the aura refunds 30 mana per cast.

3.text: Power Chord – Staccato: Power Chord deals「 40% bonus magic damage. 」「 28 − 336 (based on level) (+ 28% AP) total magic damage. 」

0.text: Active: Sona  heals herself and the most wounded nearby allied champion.

1.text: Aura: Sona and tagged allied champions receive a  shield lasting up to 1.5 seconds.

2.text: Granting an ally (other than herself) the aura refunds 30 mana per cast.

3.text: Power Chord – Diminuendo: Power Chord reduces its target's size by 8% and damage output by 25% (+ 4% per 100 AP) for 3 seconds.

0.text: Active: Sona gains 20% (+ 2% per 100 AP)  bonus movement speed for 3 seconds, extended to up to 7 seconds if she doesn't take damage.

1.text: Aura: Tagged allied champions gain bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.

2.text: Granting an ally (other than herself) the aura refunds 30 mana per cast.

3.text: Power Chord – Tempo: Power Chord  slows its target by 40% (+ 4% per 100 AP) for 2 seconds, capped at a maximum of 99%.

0.text: Passive: Sona's basic abilities' base cooldowns are reduced.

1.text: Active: Sona plays an irresistible chord in a line in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemy champions within its path and  stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

1.concerningText: Active: Sona sends out bolts of sound that deal magic damage to the two nearest  visible enemies, prioritizing champions.
Aura: Sona and tagged allied champions deal bonus magic damage on their next basic attack within 5 seconds.

2.concerningText: Active: Sona  heals herself and the most wounded nearby allied champion.
Aura: Sona and tagged allied champions receive a  shield lasting up to 1.5 seconds.

4.concerningText: Passive: Sona's basic abilities' base cooldowns are reduced.

Stats

+8 ability power
+10 health
+50% base mana regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Tribute: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants 20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Frostfang, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TRIBUTE: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants  20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 ability power
+20 ability haste
+200 health
+100% base mana regeneration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Starlit Grace: When affecting champions with attacks or abilities in combat, heal the nearby allied champion (excluding yourself) with the most missing health for 70 (2 second cooldown).
Each second spent in combat with champions grants 7% heal and shield power, stacking up to 5 times for maximum of 35%.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10 heal for this item's passive effect, Starlit Grace.
passive.originText:
UNIQUE – STARLIT GRACE: When affecting champions with attacks or abilities in combat,  heal the nearby allied champion (excluding yourself) with the most missing health for 70 (2 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Puffcap Toxin: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Healing or shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) empowers your and their next instance of damage against enemy champions within 5 seconds to apply 60% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability haste
+200 health
+100% base mana regeneration
+20% heal and shield power

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Intervention: You reveal the target area for 3 seconds. After a 2.5 second delay, a beam of light strikes the ground. Allies within the area are healed for 180 − 360 (based on target's level), while enemy champions take 10% of target's maximum health as true damage. Can be used while dead. (120 second cooldown; 5500 range).

(120 second cooldown; 5500 range).
